regen.absent_element: confirmation for successful execution of mode transitions
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall confirm and log the successful execution of the transition to the determined startup mode.

regen.absent_element: decision-making process detail for mode execution based on termination type
regen.new_specification: Before executing a startup mode, the TCS shall verify the status of the previous termination to determine the appropriate mode.

regen.absent_element: logging or notification of the selected startup mode
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall log the selected startup mode (Normal or Recovery) during each initialization for diagnostic purposes.

label: When the TCS Software is terminated normally the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode of operation upon application of power.
absence: situation of the TCS Software is terminated normally
